message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be valuable to you. I'm asking for $150 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested, but $150 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $90?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is a bit too low, I'm willing to come down to $130. I believe this product will really benefit you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  I could maybe do $100, but I wouldn't want to go any higher.
